title: Drop of Blood
description: A red drop of blood. May be used to talk about bleeding, injury, blood donation, or menstruation.
apple_vendor_description: Rendered with a striking crimson hue and a plump, rounded form, the drop of blood emoji on Apple devices has a liquid sheen thanks to Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading. Realistic lighting catches its surface, making it appear fresh and viscous, symbolizing injury, a cut, or a medical context. It can also be used metaphorically to represent sacrifice, intensity, or a strong emotional impact.
